medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive, unremitting right upper quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 10 hours prior to admission after dinner. The pain has been progressive and unremitting, associated with nausea and vomiting (non-bilious, non-blood). The patient reports having experienced less severe post-prandial pain for many weeks prior, but this episode is more severe.
